input.sentences: she was all dressed up for the dinner .
he surprised her with a gift .
output.sentences: Her boyfriend woke her up early for a special day.
She dressed nicely for dinner and asked him to take her photo.
She thought her boyfriend looked cute drinking his margarita through a straw.
The two of them posed for a selfie to remember the day.
To end the day, her boyfriend surprised her with a gift and a rose on the counter when they got home,
